001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlertStatusRequest;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CGMAlertStatusRequest;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.OtherNotification2StatusRequest;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.OtherNotificationStatusRequest;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.AlarmStatusResponse;
013import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.AlertStatusResponse;
014import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.CGMAlertStatusResponse;
015import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusResponse;
016import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.OtherNotification2StatusResponse;
017import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.OtherNotificationStatusResponse;
018import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.ReminderStatusResponse;
019import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.JavaHelpers;
020
021import java.time.Instant;
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.HashSet;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027
028/**
029 * Bundle of notification related responses for easier processing
030 */
031public class NotificationBundle {
032    private AlertStatusResponse alertStatusResponse;
033    private ReminderStatusResponse reminderStatusResponse;
034    private AlarmStatusResponse alarmStatusResponse;
035    private CGMAlertStatusResponse cgmAlertStatusResponse;
036    private MalfunctionStatusResponse malfunctionStatusResponse;
037    private OtherNotificationStatusResponse otherNotificationStatusResponse;
038    private OtherNotification2StatusResponse otherNotification2StatusResponse;
039
040    private Map<Class<? extends Message>, Instant> lastUpdatedTimes = new HashMap<>();
041
042    public static List<Message> allRequests() {
043        return Arrays.asList(
044                new AlertStatusRequest(),
045                new AlarmStatusRequest(),
046                new CGMAlertStatusRequest(),
047                new MalfunctionStatusRequest(),
048                new OtherNotification2StatusRequest(),
049                new OtherNotificationStatusRequest(new byte[]{2}),
050                new OtherNotificationStatusRequest(new byte[]{4})
051        );
052    }
053
054    public static List<Class<? extends Message>> responseClasses() {
055        return Arrays.asList(
056                AlertStatusResponse.class,
057                ReminderStatusResponse.class,
058                AlarmStatusResponse.class,
059                CGMAlertStatusResponse.class,
060                MalfunctionStatusResponse.class,
061                OtherNotification2StatusResponse.class,
062                OtherNotificationStatusResponse.class
063        );
064    }
065
066    public static boolean isNotificationResponse(Message message) {
067        for (Class<? extends Message> m : responseClasses()) {
068            if (m.isInstance(message)) return true;
069        }
070
071        return false;
072    }
073
074    public NotificationBundle() {
075    }
076
077    public NotificationBundle(NotificationBundle bundle) {
078        this.alertStatusResponse = bundle.alertStatusResponse;
079        this.reminderStatusResponse = bundle.reminderStatusResponse;
080        this.alarmStatusResponse = bundle.alarmStatusResponse;
081        this.cgmAlertStatusResponse = bundle.cgmAlertStatusResponse;
082        this.malfunctionStatusResponse = bundle.malfunctionStatusResponse;
083        this.otherNotificationStatusResponse = bundle.otherNotificationStatusResponse;
084        this.otherNotification2StatusResponse = bundle.otherNotification2StatusResponse;
085        this.lastUpdatedTimes = bundle.lastUpdatedTimes;
086    }
087
088    public NotificationBundle add(Message message) {
089        if (!isNotificationResponse(message)) return this;
090
091        if (message instanceof AlertStatusResponse) {
092            alertStatusResponse = (AlertStatusResponse) message;
093            lastUpdatedTimes.put(AlertStatusResponse.class, Instant.now());
094        } else if (message instanceof ReminderStatusResponse) {
095            reminderStatusResponse = (ReminderStatusResponse) message;
096            lastUpdatedTimes.put(ReminderStatusResponse.class, Instant.now());
097        } else if (message instanceof AlarmStatusResponse) {
098            alarmStatusResponse = (AlarmStatusResponse) message;
099            lastUpdatedTimes.put(AlarmStatusResponse.class, Instant.now());
100        } else if (message instanceof CGMAlertStatusResponse) {
101            cgmAlertStatusResponse = (CGMAlertStatusResponse) message;
102            lastUpdatedTimes.put(CGMAlertStatusResponse.class, Instant.now());
103        } else if (message instanceof MalfunctionStatusResponse) {
104            malfunctionStatusResponse = (MalfunctionStatusResponse) message;
105            lastUpdatedTimes.put(MalfunctionStatusResponse.class, Instant.now());
106        } else if (message instanceof OtherNotificationStatusResponse) {
107            otherNotificationStatusResponse = (OtherNotificationStatusResponse) message;
108            lastUpdatedTimes.put(OtherNotificationStatusResponse.class, Instant.now());
109        } else if (message instanceof OtherNotification2StatusResponse) {
110            otherNotification2StatusResponse = (OtherNotification2StatusResponse) message;
111            lastUpdatedTimes.put(OtherNotification2StatusResponse.class, Instant.now());
112        }
113
114        return this;
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * @return list of raw alert/alarm enums or string errors
119     */
120    public List<Object> get() {
121        ArrayList<Object> slugs = new ArrayList<>();
122
123        if (alertStatusResponse != null) {
124            alertStatusResponse.getAlerts().stream().sorted().forEach(alert -> {
125                slugs.add(alert);
126            });
127        }
128        if (reminderStatusResponse != null) {
129            reminderStatusResponse.getReminders().stream().sorted().forEach(alert -> {
130                slugs.add(alert);
131            });
132        }
133        if (alarmStatusResponse != null) {
134            alarmStatusResponse.getAlarms().stream().sorted().forEach(alarm -> {
135                slugs.add(alarm);
136            });
137        }
138        if (cgmAlertStatusResponse != null) {
139            cgmAlertStatusResponse.getCgmAlerts().stream().sorted().forEach(cgmAlert -> {
140                slugs.add(cgmAlert);
141            });
142        }
143        if (malfunctionStatusResponse != null) {
144            if (malfunctionStatusResponse.hasMalfunction() &&
145                !StringUtils.isBlank(malfunctionStatusResponse.getErrorString()))
146            {
147                slugs.add(malfunctionStatusResponse);
148            }
149        }
150        // todo remaining
151
152        return slugs;
153    }
154
155    public Map<Class<? extends Message>, Instant> getLastUpdatedTimes() {
156        return lastUpdatedTimes;
157    }
158
159    public String toString() {
160        return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList("lastUpdatedTimes")));
161    }
162}
